name: get_models_by_make_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool car_specs.
Tool description: Fast, simple and reliable API to retrieve car data. Contains data on almost all car manufacturers and models, updated regularly.
API description: Fetches a list of all car models for a given car make ID using the RapidAPI Car Specs API.

makeid.description: The ID of the car make for which to retrieve the models.
